## DataViewDimensionValue interface

Represents a value of a dimension/categorical axis for one row in a data view.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DataViewDimensionValue 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [axisName](./spotfire-api.dataviewdimensionvalue.axisname.md) | <code>string</code> | Gets the name of the axis, as declared in the mod-manifest.json. |
|  [keys](./spotfire-api.dataviewdimensionvalue.keys.md) | <code>(string &#124; undefined)[]</code> | Gets the keys that identifies the corresponding entries of path in the source data base system. |
|  [path](./spotfire-api.dataviewdimensionvalue.path.md) | <code>string[]</code> | Gets an array representing the full path of the value in the hierarcy defined by the axis expression. The first value is the top level of the hierarchy and the last value is the leaf level. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getValue()](./spotfire-api.dataviewdimensionvalue.getvalue.md) | Gets a string representing the full path. |
